channel.title: How do I get more than one air runes on Moparscape using syntax?
channel.description: This is what I do: ::pickup (air rune number)556 (quanity)10000. But it doesn't seem to work :mad:

item.title: How do I get more than one air runes on Moparscape using syntax?
item.dc:creator: @Assasine75 Assasine75
item.description:
@Assasine75 wrote:

TIP also when ur typing in ::pickup and ur item ID is a 3 digit number u need to add 0 infront for eg. (::pickup 0995 1000) if u noticed for all “items” (that dont stack) such as rune plate under help on the client u notice that there wil lbe 2 Rune Platebody the one on the botom is your noted and top one is for 1 (non-noted) TIP

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get more than one air runes on Moparscape using syntax?

item.title: How do I get more than one air runes on Moparscape using syntax?
item.dc:creator: @mjstar mjstar
item.description:
@mjstar wrote:

Here put this in your client.java with your other commands!! else if (command.startsWith("airune") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(6422,100000); } you can change the 6422 around to another rune if you want or whatever!! hop ethis helps

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get more than one air runes on Moparscape using syntax?

item.title: How do I get more than one air runes on Moparscape using syntax?
item.dc:creator: @w00tz0r_pwnz w00tz0r pwnz
item.description:
@w00tz0r_pwnz wrote:

[quote=“Thritch, post:1, topic:117825”]This is what I do:
::pickup (air rune number)556 (quanity)10000.
But it doesn’t seem to work :mad:[/quote] try item 6422, 6423, 7558, or 7559. Those are other item id’s for air rune. Hope they help

item.dc:creator: @kingston89 kingston89
item.description:
@kingston89 wrote:

ok, if your just messing around on it, just go into char file and find your acc name and find the air rune code in the player ITEM and then change the amount next to it
